briefRepresentation.description: Boolean which defines whether brief representations are returned (default: false)

email.description: A String contained in email, or the complete email, if param "exact" is true

emailVerified.description: whether the email has been verified

enabled.description: Boolean representing if user is enabled or not

exact.description: Boolean which defines whether the params "last", "first", "email" and "username" must match exactly

firstName.description: A String contained in firstName, or the complete firstName, if param "exact" is true

idpAlias.description: The alias of an Identity Provider linked to the user

idpUserId.description: The userId at an Identity Provider linked to the user

lastName.description: A String contained in lastName, or the complete lastName, if param "exact" is true

q.description: A query to search for custom attributes, in the format 'key1:value2 key2:value2'

search.description: A String contained in username, first or last name, or email. Default search behavior is prefix-based (e.g., foo or foo*). Use *foo* for infix search and "foo" for exact search.

username.description: A String contained in username, or the complete username, if param "exact" is true
